text.section: The Board shall determine the times and places of its meetings.

Subject to the State budget, each member of the Board is entitled to:
compensation for each day that the member is engaged in duties of the office; and
reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations.

The Board shall:
appoint a Director for the Fund; and
review the Director's administration of the Fund.

The Director:
shall have immediate supervision and direction over the administration of the Fund;
may employ staff in accordance with the State budget; and
shall serve as the appointing authority for all staff.
An employee may appeal a disciplinary action taken by the Director to the Board.
